metadata.title: Photocall - Foto Kabina za Dogodke
metadata.description: A modern photo booth kiosk for weddings, parties, corporate events, and celebrations. Easy setup, beautiful templates, instant sharing. Capture memorable moments.
metadata.keywords: photo booth, event photo booth, wedding photo booth, party photos, corporate events, kiosk, photo kiosk, instant photos, QR sharing, event photography

hero.title: Capture Unforgettable
hero.subtitle: A modern photo booth kiosk for weddings, parties, and corporate events. Easy setup, beautiful templates, instant sharing.

easyCapture.title: Easy Capture
easyCapture.description: Large touch controls, countdown timer, and instant preview. Perfect for guests of all ages.

beautifulTemplates.title: Beautiful Templates
beautifulTemplates.description: Customize with your own frames and overlays. Add captions to personalize each photo.

instantSharing.title: Instant Sharing
instantSharing.description: Guests get a QR code to instantly download and share their photos. No app needed.

easyExport.title: Easy Export
easyExport.description: Download all photos as a ZIP. Perfect for creating albums and sharing memories later.

step1.title: Set Up
step1.description: Configure your templates and settings in the admin panel. Upload your custom frames.

step2.title: Capture
step2.description: Guests tap to start, choose a template, and take their photo with a fun countdown.

step3.title: Share
step3.description: Scan the QR code to instantly download and share. Print directly from the kiosk.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Set up your photo booth in minutes. No installation required.

footer.tagline: Photocall - Photo Booth Kiosk for Events
